mapper.select: select pr.*, date_format(pr.regdate, '%Y-%m-%d %T') fmtdate, p.name, pd.count from product_review pr, product p, purchase_detail pd where pr.userid = #{userid} and pr.productid = p.productid and pr.productid = pd.productid order by regdate desc
select count(*) cnt from product_review where userid = #{userid}
